sentences.en: ‘How was the exam?’ ‘Oh, it was a cinch!’
Chopping onions is a cinch with a food processor.
sentences.cn: 用食品加工器切洋葱是一件轻松的工作.

sentences.en: He is a cinch to be boss of this firm some day.
sentences.cn: 他将来准会成为这家公司的老板.

sentences.en: He's a cinch to win the race.
sentences.cn: 他肯定会赢得这次比赛.

sentences.en: If it wasn't him, it was you; and that's a lead - pipe cinch.
sentences.cn: 如果不是他, 那一定就是你; 这事有啥疑问呢.

sentences.en: It is cinch that I can speak English fluently now.
sentences.cn: 现在流利地说英语对于我来说是件容易的事了.

sentences.en: It sounds difficult, but compared to full-time work it was a cinch.
sentences.cn: 这听上去有难度，可是比起全职工作来，就是小意思了。

sentences.en: It's a cinch that the horse will win the race.
It's a cinch they will win.
It's a cinch. I'll have the car repaired by Friday.
sentences.cn: 小事一桩. 星期五之前我可以把车修好.

sentences.en: She's a cinch to beat the Colossal, and I got even money!
sentences.cn: 她会稳稳当当地打败快逻号我会赢钱的!

sentences.en: That blue racing car is a cinch to win the next race.
sentences.cn: 那辆蓝色赛车在下一场比赛中肯定赢.

sentences.en: That horse is a cinch to win the next race.
sentences.cn: 那匹马在下一场比赛中肯定赢.

sentences.en: This time the opportunity presented what he fatuously termed to himself a'cinch '.
sentences.cn: 这一次出现的机会极为难得,他满以为十拿九稳哩.

words.tran_cn: 肚带；紧握；有把握的事情

trans.tran_cn: 容易做的事情，必然发生的事
系（马的）肚带，〈美俚〉确定，弄清楚，弄明白，确实掌握，确保
